subtitleNullable: Draw-a-Person hand-drawn sketches by children 4 to 11 years
descriptionNullable:
### About the dataset

This a dataset created during PhD thesis study of Ochilbek Rakhmanov. Nearly 1000 images were drawn by primary school students and were classified by professionals into 8 classes according to their mental ages. The task during the research was to train the machine to classify the dataset automatically.

### Research
There are several published papers on this dataset, with highest prediction accuracy of %65, which still needs a major improvement. 
Link to the papers: https://github.com/MrLachin/DAPT_classification/tree/main/published_papers.
